title: mElumElu
sahitya:
mElu mElu rAma nAma sukha mI dharalO manasA phala lOcana vAlmIkAdi bAlAnila jAdalu sAkSiga



caraNam 1



 niNDu dAhamukonna manujulaku nIru drAgina sukhambukaNTE  

canda dAridhya manujulaku dhana bhANDam abbina sukhambukaNTE

   

caraNam 2



 tapamu sairincani janula kamrta vApi abbina sukhambukaNTE 

dari dApulEka bhayamandu vELala dhairyamu galgu sukhambukaNTE

   

caraNam 3



 Akali vELala panca bhakSya paramAnnam abbina sukhambukaNTE 

shrIkaruDau shrI rAmuni manasuna cincintu sukhambukaNTE

   

caraNam 4



 sArahInamau krOdha samayamuna shAntamu galgu sukhambukaNTE 

nErani mUDulaku sakala vidyA pAramu teliyu sukhambukaNTE

   

caraNam 5



 rAmunipai nija bhakti galigi gAnarasamu telisina sukahmbukaNTE 

pAmara celimi sEyanivAri bhAvanu lOni sukhambukaNTE

   

caraNam 6



 cEyatamu vEdAnta vicAraNa cEyaga galgu sukhambukaNTE 

bAyaka nirguNa bhAvamugala para brahmAnubhava sukhambukaNTE

   

caraNam 7



 rAjasa tAmasa guManulu lEni pUjalu galgu sukhambukaNTE 

rAja shikhAmaNiyaina tyAgarAja kOsangu sukhambuakNTE
